articles.title: 60 Budget-Friendly Alternatives To Birkenstock, Drunk Elephant, And Other Top Brands
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: Several companies have introduced new products that rival existing ones in the market. TruSkin launched a vitamin C serum as an alternative to SkinCeuticals CE Ferulic serum, Hanes launched ultimate crew socks as an alternative to Aritzia TNA socks and E.l.f. launched Halo Glow Liquid Filter as a substitute for Charlotte Tilbury's Flawless Filter. Furthermore, NYX launched Fat Oil Lip Drip, a lip gloss alternative to Dior's Lip Oil.

articles.title: Mini Cooper S Cabriolet 2025, pleasure above all
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: Mini launched the new Mini Cooper S Convertible, featuring a 2.0-liter 4 turbo engine delivering 201 horsepower and a 7-speed double-clutch automatic transmission. The car maintains its iconic design with round headlights and Union Jack-styled rear lights.

articles.title: 27 Wayfair Organization Finds That Work Overtime
articles.author: Emily Shwake
articles.summary: The article showcases various new storage and organizational products designed for different areas of the home. These products range from tilt-out hampers and rolling drawers to modular closet systems and spice racks. The items address common organizational challenges and improve home aesthetics.

articles.title: Value-hungry Aussies will benefit from even more auto brands, says BYD
articles.summary: BYD, an auto brand, intends to offer more brands for Australian customers. This is aimed to benefit value-hungry Aussies.

articles.title: Mutazione Has Launched on IOS and Android Today
articles.author: Deepak Chongtham
articles.summary: Die Gute Fabrik and Akupara Games launched Mutazione on iOS and Android. Mutazione, a narrative adventure game, was originally released in 2019. The game is a mutant soap opera following Kai, a teenage girl.

articles.title: ColoringBooks.ai Print-on-Demand, Publishing and Manufacturing debuts in St. Louis, MO
articles.summary: ColoringBooks.ai launched its Print-on-Demand Service, enabling authors and publishers to print as few as 12 books with options for black-and-white or full-color printing, paperback or hardcover, and various binding options. The service also offers direct shipping to customers, including AI-generated designs, allowing writers and authors to sell through any book seller, website, or store, with direct shipping to customers and no need for a massive inventory.

articles.title: 2026 Toyota LandCruiser 300 Hybrid: Everything we know
articles.author: Damion Smy
articles.summary: LandCruiser Hybrid utilizes a parallel hybrid system with both a petrol engine and electric motor. It features front, center, and rear electronic differential locks. The LX700h F Sport grade, available in the US, is equipped with a Torsen limited-slip differential (LSD).

articles.title: Aldi shoppers go wild for boozy BBQ essential that's just £1.70 and perfect for the hot weather
articles.author: Becky Pemberton
articles.summary: ALDI is launching new alcoholic Mango Margarita cans priced at £1.70. Additionally, ALDI introduces BuzzBallz, pre-mixed drinks in flavors like Choc Tease, Strawberry Rita, and Tequila Rita, priced at £2.99.

articles.title: Next linen top that 'doesn't crease' is selling out fast
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Next is offering the Short-Sleeve Boxy T-shirt with Linen in six different styles, priced between £19 and £25. Customers praise the top for its comfortable linen blend, versatility, and stylish designs, available in sizes six to 26. The product is being touted as a favorable summer wardrobe piece.

articles.title: This Gadget Gets Every Drop Out Of Beauty Products
articles.author: Cierra Cowan
articles.summary: An Amazon seller is offering a toothpaste squeezer for $9.99. This metal device helps users extract the last drop of product from tubes of toothpaste, hair gel, makeup primer, and other tube-packaged items. It is available in two colors.

articles.title: Dyson vacuum that pet owners swear by is having its biggest price drop of 2025
articles.author: Cailey Lindberg
articles.summary: Dyson has released a new version of the Supersonic Hair Dryer, boasting it as their lightest and most powerful yet, featuring new colors like Jasper Plum and Pink/Rose Gold. This hair dryer includes five attachments designed for precise drying, moisture retention, and a smooth finish. In addition, there is a deal on Dyson V8 Absolute Vacuum from $520 to just $350.

articles.title: AWS boosts foundational AI startups
articles.author: Raymond Gregory Tribdino
articles.summary: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is launching the third cohort of its Generative AI Accelerator program in 2025. The program supports startups developing foundational AI technologies by providing up to $1 million in AWS credits, technical mentorship, and go-to-market support, with applications open from June 10 through July 10.

articles.title: ‘Amazing' anti-ageing cream that reduces wrinkles in 7 days, leaving skin plump & smooth & it's half price at Boots
articles.author: Colette Fountain
articles.summary: Olay is offering its Regenerist Day Face Cream, an anti-ageing moisturizer, at half price at Boots. The product, known for reducing wrinkles with Niacinamide and Peptides, is part of Olay's Regenerist range, which includes a night cream, night mask, and ultra-rich day cream; Olay also introduced refill versions of their most popular products for environmentally-conscious customers.

articles.title: If You Sleep Hot, You Could Use These 30 Products
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: The article presents a collection of products aimed at providing a cooler sleep experience, including oscillating tower fans, cooling mattress pads, and silk pillowcases. It also features Japanese cooling fiber pillowcases, SweatBlock wipes, and cooling pillows designed for hot sleepers, alongside solutions like cooling bed sheets, linen bedding bundles, and sweat-wicking pajamas, as well as the ChiliPAD sleep system.

articles.title: Future of Batteries Summit 2025 to Accelerate US Energy Transition and Solid-State Battery Manufacturing
articles.author: Access Newswire
articles.summary: New to The Street (NTTS) and High Performance Battery Technology (HPB) are launching the Future of Batteries Summit in New York City. The summit focuses on industry discussions about advanced battery technologies, particularly those from High Performance Battery Technology (HPB), highlighting applications in various sectors, emphasizing safety, efficiency, and cost-effectiveness. The event aims to connect industry leaders and stakeholders to explore battery solutions.

articles.title: 33 Must-Have Beach Products For Family Summer Fun
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: The article highlights the launch of new products. Baby Bum SPF 50 Sunscreen is introduced as a mineral-based sunscreen, while Supergoop Glowscreen is presented as an SPF 40 sunscreen with a shimmer effect. Additionally, the article features the Hatch Rest Go sound machine, designed to help children sleep in unfamiliar environments.

articles.title: New to The Street Episode #671 Airs Tonight on Bloomberg Television at 6:30 PM EST Featuring FLOKI, Arrive AI (NASDAQ: ARAI), Health In Tech (NASDAQ: HIT), Vita Bella, and NRX Pharmaceuticals (NASDAQ: NRXP)
articles.summary: PetVivo Holdings, Inc. is introducing its innovative SPRYNG™ product. The product is being featured on the New to The Street business television series.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 teased as brand's thinnest phone yet
articles.author: The Hans India
articles.summary: Samsung is teasing the Galaxy Z Fold 7, which is designed to be the thinnest and lightest foldable from the brand. The device focuses on portability and one-handed use, and it is expected to include Ultra-level flagship features such as enhanced cameras and Galaxy AI tools. Samsung aims to redefine foldables with the Fold 7, emphasizing slimness, intelligence, and power.

articles.title: Fresh produce with your package: Amazon testing tighter grocery bundling for same-day deliveries
articles.author: Taylor Soper
articles.summary: Amazon is integrating grocery shopping into its main e-commerce platform to allow customers to bundle perishable items with other Amazon.com products for same-day and overnight delivery.  This initiative, tested in Phoenix, Kansas City, and Orlando, aims to make it easier for customers to buy groceries alongside other items.

articles.title: Lava Shark 5G Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Lava announced the Lava Shark 5G smartphone on May 23, 2025. The phone features a 6.75-inch display, a Unisoc T765 processor, 4GB of RAM, 64GB of internal storage, a 13-megapixel rear camera, and a 5-megapixel front camera. It is powered by a 5000 mAh battery with 18W wired charging and runs on Android 15.

articles.title: Taco Bell Fans Rejoice Over Nationwide Launch Of Unlikely New Menu Items
articles.author: Colleen Dilthey Thomas
articles.summary: Taco Bell is launching a new Crispy Chicken menu nationwide on June 17th for a limited time. The menu includes Crispy Chicken Tacos, Crispy Chicken Burritos, and Crispy Chicken Strips, along with Spicy Ranchero and Avocado Ranch sauces. This introduction follows a successful test of Crispy Chicken Nuggets in select markets.

articles.title: Lidl shoppers spot new Birthday Cake Bun in bakeries
articles.author: Molly Court
articles.summary: Lidl has introduced a new Birthday Cake Bun in its bakeries, priced at 79p. Customers can also claim a free doughnut in-store on their birthday via the Lidl Plus app. Additionally, Lidl Plus app users can obtain free bakery items and other products based on their spending habits.

articles.title: I tested the virtually unknown AI app that might take over your Galaxy lock screen
articles.author: Jon Gilbert
articles.summary: Glance AI has partnered with Samsung to launch an AI-powered fashion recommendation feature that utilizes user selfies to generate personalized outfits. The app, currently available on Galaxy S22 and later S-series devices, suggests styles and provides links to purchase similar products, aiming to showcase an idealized version of the user.

articles.title: 35 Products You'll High-Five Yourself For Buying
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Good Molecules introduced Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel with yerba mate, caffeine, and hyaluronic acid. Veet launched a sensitive hair removal gel with aloe for redness and irritation. Cosrx released a hydrating repairing essence with snail secretion filtrate for moisture and skin improvement.

articles.title: Chanson International prices 16M units at 50c in public offering
articles.author: Tip Ranks
articles.summary: Chanson International is launching new products. These include a self-developed 'Songkang Meal' series, a new formulation for sugar, and a new natural sweetener blend.

articles.title: Next-Gen Xbox Cloud Gaming: New Servers & Subscription?
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Microsoft is testing its next-generation Xbox Cloud Gaming servers, potentially leading to a standalone subscription option separate from Xbox Game Pass Ultimate. The upgraded servers aim to deliver enhanced performance with reduced latency, better bitrate, and higher resolution options. This standalone subscription would cater to gamers primarily interested in streaming.

articles.title: Review: 'I'm in love with a robot vacuum called Tina'
articles.author: John Bett
articles.summary: Switchbot launched the K10+ Pro Combo, a 3-in-1 vacuuming solution comprising a robot vacuum, a cordless vacuum, and an auto-emptying base station. The SwitchBot K10+ Pro is available for £799.99 on the SwitchBot website where you can get it with a 30 per cent discount, and it's on sale on Amazon for £467.99.

articles.title: Simba's 'cool touch' duvet sends me to sleep in a heatwave
articles.author: Tiffany Lo
articles.summary: Simba has launched the Summer Hybrid Duvet, designed for lightweight warmth and body heat regulation during summer. Priced from £129, the 4.5 Tog duvet features Stratos tech and a special webbing pattern to keep sleepers cool. The duvet is machine washable and available in Single, Double, King, and Super King sizes.

articles.title: 8 Wrinkle-Resistant Dresses for Summer Under $50 at Amazon
articles.author: Jamie Allison Sanders
articles.summary: Amazon is promoting a selection of wrinkle-resistant dresses available on its platform, including the Amazon Essentials Sleeveless Woven Shift Dress, the Alaster Loose Tunic T-Shirt Dress, the Nclook Sleeveless Mini Dress with Pockets, and others. These dresses are highlighted for their easy packing and travel-friendly features, with multiple customers praising their wrinkle-free fabric.

articles.title: Unlocking the Benefits of TextNowPlus Free Phone Numbers
articles.author: Oluyemi Ogunseyin
articles.summary: TextNowPlus introduces a service to obtain free or low-cost phone numbers using VoIP technology. It allows users to make calls and send texts over Wi-Fi or mobile data and switch between numbers easily. The service provides various types of phone numbers, including local, toll-free, and temporary numbers.

articles.title: Molton Brown's £28 set is 'great' Father's Day gift with next day delivery
articles.author: Charlotte Smith
articles.summary: Amazon offers Molton Brown's The Classic Explorer Body and Hair Mini Travel Bag, a gift set containing eight Molton Brown products in a travel case, priced at £28. The set includes body washes, lotion, and shampoo featuring signature scents like Recharge Black Pepper. According to Amazon, Molton Brown enjoys a 97% positive rating from customers.

articles.title: 绝代双娇，还是卧龙凤雏？五羊NWG150 VS 新大洲NS150GX
articles.author: 骑士网
articles.summary: Wuyang-Honda's NWG150 and Sundiro-Honda's NS150GX are compared in a recent video review. The review highlights that both motorcycles, despite having different appearances, share similar internal characteristics, suggesting Honda's involvement in their core engineering.

articles.title: 31 Cheap Things From Amazon's "Most Wished For" Section
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Amazon features a 'Most Wished For' section with trending products. Several companies introduced new products like OPI's RapiDry Quick Dry Nail Polish, NeeDoh's "Dream Pop" fidget toy, Dash single-serve ice cream maker, Frida Baby rinse cup, Medicube's collagen jelly, Beauty of Joseon eye cream, Grace & Stella eye masks, Bio-Collagen's Real Deep sheet mask, Anua pore-clearing cleansing oil and Eos' Shea Butter Vanilla Cashmere body lotion.

articles.title: Nectar Duvet Review: The Best All-Year Duvet For Hotel-Level Comfort
articles.summary: Nectar has launched the Nectar Duvet, featuring Smartfil® technology and Modal fabric for light, breathable, and temperature-controlled comfort. The duvet aims to transform beds into sanctuaries of sophistication with a smooth, wrinkle-free appearance. Delivery of the duvet was reported to be fast and efficient.

articles.title: UGCTeam.io Launches Innovative Social Media Video Creation Platform Combining AI and Human Talent
articles.author: UGCTeam
articles.summary: UGCTeam.io has launched a new content creation service specializing in short-form videos for platforms like YouTube, Instagram, and TikTok. The service combines AI-generated avatars with real-person content creation to offer a scalable solution for social media content, including copywriting, editing, and multi-platform publishing support.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge: Powerful Flagship Phone
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Samsung has announced the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge, a new flagship smartphone featuring a curved edge display, premium materials like Gorilla Glass Victus2 and a titanium frame, and a 6.7-inch dynamic AMOLED 2X screen. It is powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy and runs on One UI 7.0 based on Android 15, with a focus on design, performance and AI integration.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Archives
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled the Galaxy S25 Edge, highlighting breakthroughs in design and AI. The device features an elegant design and premium build, along with a vibrant display and high performance. Potential expandable storage options are also under consideration.

articles.title: The 50 Best Amazon Prime Deals in June 2025: Up to 80% Off
articles.author: Clara Mcmahon
articles.summary: Amazon is offering exclusive deals to its Prime members, featuring discounts on a variety of products. These include items like cordless vacuums, floral maxi dresses, spray mops, personal-size blenders, electric toothbrushes, and furniture sets, with some products up to 80% off.

articles.title: Even G1 Smart Glasses Review: Are these live-translating frames the future of smart tech?
articles.author: London Evening Standard
articles.summary: Even Realities G1 smart glasses offer stylish design and functionality. However, the glasses require several improvements to achieve market leadership.

articles.title: 39 Money-Saving Products That Are Genius Purchases
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: L'Oréal Paris launched BB Cream, a green-tinted formula that combats redness and evens complexion. Maybelline introduced SuperStay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick, offering long-lasting staying power. Eos launched Shea Butter Vanilla Cashmere body lotion with a caramel-vanilla smell.

articles.title: Raise a glass to National Beer Day: tips on the perfect pint
articles.author: Hannah Crosbie
articles.summary: Kirin Ichiban Premium Beer First Press, a delicate malt beer from Japan, is introduced. Vault City Raspberry Sour, a fruity and tart sour beer from Edinburgh, is also mentioned. Additionally, The Kernel Imperial Brown Stout, London 1856, offering deep coffee notes, and Erdinger Alkoholfrei, a tasty, malty wheat beer, are presented as new products.

articles.title: Your dad shops online more than you think
articles.author: Junior Publisher
articles.summary: The News24 survey revealed that South African consumers are using Temu for affordable purchases of items. 46% of South African respondents report saving more than half of their shopping budget by using Temu.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 Archives
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7 in mid-July. The information was revealed from New York. The article also mentions Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 and Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7.

articles.title: Still Looking? These Quick Father's Day Picks Save the Day
articles.author: Askari Jaffer
articles.summary: Bonjour introduces the Regalia Signature Box, a premium gift set including stretch-fit cotton socks and handkerchiefs enhanced with Silver N9 technology. MyDesignation features the Wild West shirt, made from breathable cotton, inspired by Wild West films, and designed for daily wear.

articles.title: JSW MG Motor Celebrates Sixth Anniversary In India, Launches Limited Time Offer On ZS EV
articles.author: Shahrukh Shah
articles.summary: JSW MG Motor is celebrating its 6th anniversary in India by introducing a limited-time price cut offer on its ZS EV, making it more accessible. The ZS EV is a battery-powered model, which comes in four trims and is powered by a 50.3 kWh Lithium-ion battery.

articles.title: Lidl will soon begin selling Shark carpet cleaner dupe that is £170 cheaper
articles.author: Laura McGuire
articles.summary: Lidl is launching a new carpet cleaner, a Vax Dual Power Carpet Cleaner, as a cheaper alternative to the Shark carpet cleaner, priced at £79.99. Lidl is also offering the Silvercrest Bladeless Tower Fan for £54.99 with the Lidl Plus app and a £3.99 dupe for the Sol de Janeiro body spray.

articles.title: Lidl will soon begin selling Shark carpet cleaner dupe that is £170 cheaper
articles.author: Laura Mcguire
articles.summary: Lidl is launching a carpet cleaner dupe of the Shark brand for £79.99. Lidl also offers a £3.99 dupe for Sol de Janeiro body spray. Additionally, Lidl has the Silvercrest Bladeless Tower Fan, a cheaper alternative to the Dyson Cool Tower Fan, on offer for £54.99 with the Lidl Plus app.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch: Rewriting Console Gaming Rules
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Nintendo is anticipated to release the Nintendo Switch 2, a new generation of their hybrid console, with expected improvements in graphics, processing power, and features. The new console will likely maintain the Switch's hybrid design, offering both docked and handheld modes, and may include backward compatibility with existing Switch games. A strong launch lineup of games, including new installments in popular franchises, is also expected.

articles.title: 37 Genius Products To Fix Home Annoyances
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: The article highlights several new products for home improvement and cleaning. Ruggable introduces machine-washable rugs, while other products include peel-and-stick tiles, stainless steel cleaner, and grout stain remover. These items aim to offer practical solutions to common household problems, improving aesthetics and functionality.

articles.title: Even G1 Smart Glasses Review: Are these live-translating frames the future of smart tech?
articles.author: Will Rogers-Coltman
articles.summary: Even Realities has launched the G1 smart glasses, available in two styles and three colors. The G1 glasses feature a Holistic Adaptive Optical System which beams green text onto the lenses for features like real-time language translation and map usage, and connects to the Even Realities app via Bluetooth. The glasses cost £594 (+£125 for prescription lenses).

articles.title: I Tried Tasty's AI-Powered Recipe Remixes to Spice Up My Usual Meals
articles.author: Amanda Smith
articles.summary: Tasty launched Recipe Remixes in March 2025, a new AI-powered feature within their iOS app. This free feature, powered by OpenAI's GPT-4o, provides variations of classic Tasty recipes, allowing users to make them easier, more nutritious, or more flavorful. The Tasty app also prompts users to add ingredients to a cart to place an order via its grocery partner, Walmart.

articles.title: The Balls Reviewers Say Made Them Ditch Dryer Sheets
articles.author: Lourdes Avila Uribe
articles.summary: Wool dryer balls, an alternative to dryer sheets, are available for purchase on Amazon. These dryer balls, made with New Zealand wool, aim to reduce drying time, save energy, and act as fabric softeners. Amazon sells them in packs of four, six, or twelve.

articles.title: Review: I watched Clarkson's Farm on the garden fence thanks to Dangbei's N2 Mini projector
articles.author: Steve Wollaston
articles.summary: Dangbei launched the N2 Mini, a lightweight and compact projector that runs on Linux OS and is available on Amazon. The device features built-in Netflix, YouTube, Prime, and Disney+ access and offers 1080 resolution. It is versatile, portable and robust, with a price of £169.15 (15% off).

articles.title: I watched Clarkson's Farm on the garden fence thanks to Dangbei's N2 Mini
articles.author: Steve Wollaston
articles.summary: Dangbei launched the N2 Mini projector, a lightweight and compact device that runs on Linux and offers access to streaming platforms. The projector boasts 1080 resolution, a built-in Gimble stand, and autofocus, and it is available on Amazon for £169.15 (15% off).

articles.title: Father's Day 2025 Gifting Guide: From Cologne to Shaving Kits, 5 Thoughtful and Last-Minute Grooming Essentials To Gift Your Dad
articles.author: Priyanka Munshi
articles.summary: The article recommends grooming essentials as Father's Day gift ideas. These include shaving kits with razors, lathering cream, and aftershave gel, beard grooming sets with oil, balm, comb, and trimmer, face wash & moisturizer kits, hair & body wash combos, and signature colognes. These products aim to enhance a father's grooming routine.

articles.title: Boden fans say 'it's everything I love' as summer maxi skirt reduced by £45 in sale
articles.author: Phoebe Barton
articles.summary: Boden has reduced the price of its Nadia Poplin Maxi Skirt to £67.20 from £112, offering a saving of £44.80. The 'Blossom Cascade' floral skirt is available in petite, regular, and long fits, catering to sizes four to 22.

articles.title: Air Jordan 11 'Anniversary' So Fresh and So Clean – Release Info and Where to Buy
articles.author: Brian Mazique
articles.summary: The Air Jordan 11 'Anniversary' sneaker, originally released as a tribute to 25 years of Jordan Brand history, features a crisp and minimal design with metallic silver accents. The retro design did not have Jumpman on the upper. The shoe has remained in demand for nearly 15 years, indicating its lasting appeal.

articles.title: Kiekie, Gbemi O host star-studded launch for Nivea UV face sunscreen
articles.author: The Nation
articles.summary: Nivea launched the Nivea UV Face Sunscreen at an event. The launch aimed to introduce the skincare brand's latest innovation to the public.

articles.title: THRILLER: Coastal Carolina SURVIVES Late Arizona Rally to Clinch CRUCIAL Victory
articles.summary: Users can stream WeAreIowa content on their phones using the WeAreIowa app.

articles.title: Galaxy Z Fold 7 Design Leaked
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Samsung is planning to introduce the Galaxy Z Fold 7, featuring the Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, improved sensors, AI enhancements and advancements in lens design. A new material construction is expected to reduce weight and enhance durability, while streamlined production aims for a more competitive price point for consumers.

articles.title: 49 "Boring" Products You'll Love If You're Over 25
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: Several new products were mentioned like SweatBlock antiperspirant wipes to help with sweating, Monday Haircare Dry Shampoo for reviving greasy hair, Medicube's "Zero Pore" Pads for smoother skin, and Elizavecca's Collagen Coating Hair Protein Treatment for frizz-free hair. These introductions aim to solve specific problems and enhance personal care routines.

articles.title: This Toy Mimics Oral Sex —  & Honestly, It Might Be Better Than the Real Thing
articles.summary: Womanizer launched the Womanizer Next, a new pleasure toy featuring 3D Pleasure Air technology that mimics oral sex with air pulses adapting to the body's rhythm. The device also includes Dynamic Dimension Drive allowing control of speed and depth of stimulation and has multiple intensity and depth settings.

articles.title: Mount Vernon Events: June 13, 2025
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Mount Vernon is introducing new historical experiences for the summer of 2025, including fresh bread tasting at the Half Crown Bakehouse, appearances by costumed interpreters portraying figures from George Washington's world, and a state-of-the-art virtual mansion tour. These offerings aim to provide immersive and engaging ways for visitors to connect with history.

articles.title: Sweet Robo Heats Up IGES 2025 with New Machines and a Bold Partnership Reveal
articles.author: Sweet Robo
articles.summary: At IGES 2025, [Company] is unveiling new vending machines, including CaseBOT (custom phone case vending), Cotton Candy VX (robotic cotton candy), BalloonBot (balloon vending automation), and Candy Monster (candy vending). The company will also announce a new brand partnership. The products showcase the company's focus on automated vending solutions.

articles.title: Sony talks PS6 and next gen plans with hint at new portable console
articles.author: Metro UK
articles.summary: Sony is planning its next generation console, the PS6. This includes discussions about a new handheld device.

articles.title: The 10 best Nintendo Switch 2 games you can play right now – must-play titles ...
articles.author: The Mirror
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching the Nintendo Switch 2 hybrid console. Several launch games are planned to be available to play with the new console.

articles.title: Sun, Sand, Skincare at Nivea Sunscreen Launch
articles.author: This Day
articles.summary: Beiersdorf Nivea launched its new product, the Nivea UV Face Sunscreen, at an event in Lagos, Nigeria. The event combined entertainment with education about the importance of sun protection.

articles.title: Seinde Signature Unveils Saudade with a Flavourful Twist
articles.author: This Day
articles.summary: Botanicae, a Spanish niche brand, launched Saudade, its latest fragrance. The unveiling event was hosted in Lagos by Seinde Signature, a premium niche perfume retailer.

articles.title: This Denver lab aims to make testing gear easier for smaller outdoor businesses
articles.author: Bernadette Berdychowski
org: College of Engineering, Design, and Computing
articles.summary: The Outside Lab at CU Denver offers testing services to outdoor gear companies. Town Hall Outdoor Co. utilized the lab's facilities to test fabrics and subsequently improved the durability of their Down Town Puffy jacket by switching to a more durable ripstop fabric based on the lab's findings.
